name: The adventure of 1 bit ( Alpha)
description:
This game is just starting and would be happy if you tried it out and you could give me concept and feedback so i can improve this game!

btw there are some bugs and the songs that i posted some of them are concepts please say if you like them and also i put in 1 cheat code with 3 uses!

also could you tell people about it it may help me develop this game knowing people own it! 

2.0. :Bug fixes and new world!!!
